value.0:
Basic Driving:
f - change direction to forward
b - change direction to reverse
a - accelerate
d - decelerate
r - turn right
l - turn left
x - exit vehicle


Camera:
ce - External Camera (default)
cs - Straight First Person Camera
cl - Left Camera
cr - Right Camera
cu - Camera Up
cd - Camera Down

Special Actions:
attack - shoot equipped or vehicle-mounted weapon against nearest enemy.
missile - fire missile
heavymissile - fire heavy missile
bomb - drop bomb
land - land a ship
launch - launch a ship

Visual Actions (no effect; must be at zero speed):
rollr - roll to the right
rolll - roll to the left
spin - spin end-over-end

Instructions:
To use the system, you should say your commands out loud, on either the Talk or DM channel.  Quickslot these with /dm command, like /dm a or /dm d - it's a LOT easier!  Nearby NPC's (including your vehicle) will interpret the commands.  Your vehicle will drive in a stright line, at a constant speed, unless commanded otherwise.  
In forward motion, you must use a and d to speed up or slow down.  You can only switch to reverse motion when at ZERO forward speed.
In reverse motion, you move at a slow constant speed.
You can only turn while moving.
Note that turns and decelerations require Drive or Pilot checks that may fail - turn DC is based on speed (so turn at slow speeds!).

DM Commands:
beamhit - make a beam weapon hit nearest target
missile - missile effect on nearest target
beammiss - beam weapon that misses
fly - have ship fly up and disappear
jump - ship flies up and then lands at stored location chosen with FX wand
